'''It's Yesterday Once More''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to collect and activate 10 [[Radiant Spincrystals]] for the [[Euphonium Unbound]] furnishing series.

==Trivia==
* The achievement's name is likely a reference to the song {{w|Yesterday Once More (song)|Yesterday Once More}} by {{w|The Carpenters}}. The song itself is about listening to old songs that evoke nostalgia and bring back old feelings.
